resources.string: Begin by recording your first message.
Please grant audio recording permissions to enable the application to work. Otherwise the app won´t work properly
This application needs audio recording permissions to work. Please grant the required permissions.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, your voice is not a match. I am not allowed to speak with strangers.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, new voice. I can’t chat with strangers.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, not set for stranger chats, my friend.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, sticking to safety! No stranger chats.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, unfamiliar voice! You are not on the chat list.
🔒 Verification Failed. Sorry, unauthorized voice! Access denied!
🤖 Replay Detected. Good try, but I only talk to humans
🤖 Replay Detected. You\'ll need to try harder than that, I am the best product in the market
🤖 Replay Detected. You are making this too easy, I only talk to humans

Access token is null or expired. Ignoring request.
API not ready. Ignoring the request.

Please check your connectivity and try again
You are a helpful assistant that answers fast and short!
